question: Which of these things am I best at?
answer1: Singing, what a powerful voice I have!
answer2: Dancing, no TikTok choreography can resist me!
answer3: Public speaking, silence in the room!

question: If I'm in the supermarket line and someone cuts in, how do I react?
answer1: I get angry and tell them off, no way!
answer2: Well, I'm not in that much of a hurry... I'll just wait, it's fine.
answer3: I make a joke and cut back in front of them.

question: What does friendship mean to me?
answer1: Being able to trust someone with all my secrets.
answer2: Going out partying and having a blast.
answer3: Having someone to rely on when things go wrong.

question: For me, what would be the best thing about becoming famous?
answer1: The amazing wardrobe I could have.
answer3: Being able to take vacations whenever I wanted.

question: In which discipline would I have liked to participate in the Olympics?
What do I like the least?
If I’m gifted €500 and told I have to spend it right away, what do I do?
answer2: I buy a plane ticket in no time.
answer3: I treat my favorite people to dinner.

question: Which of these literary characters is my favorite?
answer1: Harry Potter, it's all so magical!
answer2: Dracula, the one by Bram Stoker.

question: What part of the body do I like being massaged the most?
In my opinion, success is achieved...
answer3: With a little extra help here and there.

question: Where would I prefer to take a swim?
answer1: In the crystal-clear waters of a Croatian island.
answer2: In the Blue Lagoon (Iceland), with its amazing thermal waters.
answer3: In the Dead Sea (Jordan), enjoying the zero-gravity sensation.

question: What kind of music are you most likely to catch me listening to?
answer1: Ballads from the 70s, 80s, and all eras. Ah, l'amour...
answer2: Disco music, it's always a good time to dance.
answer3: Rock with strong guitar riffs. And if I can sing it at the top of my lungs, even better.

question: For me, tickling...
If something needs to be organized, I...
answer1: Step aside and let someone else take charge.
answer2: Quickly take the reins, 'I'll handle it!'
answer3: Help if asked, but I won’t take full responsibility.

question: What sound do I find the most relaxing?
answer1: Any white noise (static TV, extractor fan hum...).

question: Which of these three things can I tolerate the least?
What literary genre do I prefer?
Which of these places would I prefer to live in?
answer1: New York, the city that never sleeps.
answer2: A tiny remote village, as far from civilization as possible.

question: Which of these things, once I start, can I not stop doing?
Which wonder of the world would I absolutely want to see?
answer2: The city of Petra, in Jordan.

question: What event would I really, really have loved to attend?
answer1: The 1969 Woodstock festival, in Bethel (New York).
answer2: The 1985 Live Aid concert, at Wembley Stadium.
answer3: The original Coachella festival in 1999, in the Colorado Desert.

question: What annoys me the most?
answer1: A great plan getting extended, and I can’t join.
answer2: Getting up to go somewhere and forgetting why when I get there.
answer3: Thinking of witty comebacks after the moment has passed.

question: Where would I prefer to spend an entire month?
Which of these superheroes do I prefer?
What would I most wish were real?
What scares me the most?
If I could choose a superpower, which one would I pick?
answer1: Teleportation, so I’d finally arrive on time to my appointments!
answer2: Mind-reading, to know what others think of me.
answer3: Invisibility, to sneak into forbidden places.

question: In which historical era would I prefer to have lived?
If a genie granted me one wish, what would I ask for?
What would I do first if I won the lottery?
answer2: Travel around the world... with all the time in the world.
answer3: Donate a large part to several charities.

question: If I arrive at a party and someone is wearing the same outfit as me...
answer1: I’d die of embarrassment and hide in the bathroom all night.
answer3: I’d laugh my head off and even take pictures with the other person.

question: If I get lost while on vacation, what do I do?
answer1: Ask the first person I see, even using gestures if necessary.
answer2: Look for a map somewhere and find my way without help.
answer3: Get lost? My middle name is 'Compass'!

question: What would be my dream job?
answer2: Veterinarian, to always be around animals.
answer3: Singer, the kind that fills stadiums.

question: What gets on my nerves the most?
What do I think about fireworks?
answer2: I’d ban them because they scare animals (and me a little too).
answer3: Once or twice a year is fine.

question: What landscape would I most like to explore on the back of an animal?
answer1: The Giza Pyramid Plateau (Egypt), on a camel.
answer2: The wild landscapes of Norway, on a dog sled.
answer3: The lush region of Chiang Mai (Thailand), on a majestic elephant.

question: What do I expect from a new job?
answer3: Have a schedule that allows me to focus on my own things.

question: What is my reaction to a surprise?
answer1: Oh no, I don't like them at all... better warn me first!
answer2: Neither hot nor cold, I stay the same.
answer3: Ohhhhhh! I love them! How exciting!

question: What would my ideal vacation spot be?
answer2: A cabin under the palm trees, on a paradise beach.
answer3: A 5-star hotel with an all-inclusive bracelet, like royalty!

question: What makes me grumble?
Which of these three animals would I most like to have as a pet?
What great mystery of humanity would I like to solve?
answer1: The moon landing... did it really happen?
answer3: The Nazca Desert Lines in Peru.

question: Where would I have liked to study?
answer1: At Hogwarts, learning magic. Expecto Patronum!
answer2: At Rydell High School from Grease. Rama lama ka dinga da dinga dong!
answer3: At the Jedi Temple from Star Wars... may the Force be with me!

question: What would I rather be able to do?
answer1: Speak all the languages in the world.

question: If I realize someone is watching me, how do I react?
answer1: I look them straight in the eyes, a stare-down duel!
answer2: I turn red as a tomato and try to slip away.
answer3: I directly ask them what they find soooo interesting.

question: What animal gives me nightmares?
What natural wonder would I die to see in person?
answer2: The Uyuni Salt Flats in Bolivia.

question: Which of these great artists is my favorite?
Which diva would I most like to meet?
Which historical figure would I prefer to meet?
How would I react if I met my favorite celebrity?
answer1: I’d run to ask for an autograph, a selfie, and whatever else I could!
answer2: I’d respect their privacy and say nothing.
answer3: I’d follow them and record them on my phone—such an opportunity doesn’t come every day!

question: What do I think about cosmetic surgery?
answer1: When the time comes, I’m all in.
answer2: I’d never go under the knife unless absolutely necessary.
answer3: A little tweak here and there, but nothing drastic.

question: In which musical would I prefer to live?
answer1: La La Land... alongside Ryan Gosling, of course.
answer2: Moulin Rouge, because I can can-can!

question: How do I like my coffee?
In which fantasy country would I feel most at home?
answer1: Narnia, of course—it’s right at the back of my closet.

question: Which decade’s fashion do I like the most?
answer1: The 60s: shoulder pads, colors, stonewashed jeans.
answer2: The 50s: elegance and curves, lots of curves.
answer3: The 70s: psychedelia, bell-bottoms... and disco music!

question: What makes me laugh the most?
answer1: The memes people send me—they crack me up!
answer2: Videos of kittens and puppies—they’re adorable!

question: What am I most likely to do first?
What colors do I like the most?
answer1: Fluorescent colors: yellow, fuchsia, orange—go big or go home!
answer2: Pastel tones: pink, mint, turquoise—so soft.
answer3: Primary colors: red, blue, green—long live pop art!

question: What recurring nightmare do I suffer from the most?
answer2: Being chased and unable to run.

question: Which Disney character is my favorite?

Do I believe in ghosts?
answer1: Hmm... I don’t really believe, but like myths, they might exist.

answer1: Spy on people to know what they say about me.

What ice cream flavor do I like the most?

question: Which of these three things am I best at?
answer1: Photography, born to be an Instagrammer
answer2: Improvising when faced with unexpected things, they can't catch me off guard!
answer3: Drawing, I have an undeniable artistic flair

question: What is my favorite movie genre?
answer2: Comedy, because I go to the movies to laugh and have fun
answer3: Drama, nothing like a good cry to let it all out

question: What is my favorite time of day?
answer1: The morning, I'm a morning person through and through
answer2: I'm a night owl, just don't make me wake up early
answer3: Midday is my peak time, that's when I'm at my best

question: Do I believe in extraterrestrial life?
answer1: Absolutely, the truth is out there!

question: What would I rather have?
answer1: The hoverboard from Back to the Future

question: Who would I prefer to have as a pet?
What is my ideal vacation destination?

answer1: I never lie, honesty above all

question: How do I prefer to greet and be greeted?

question: How do I react in an emergency?
answer1: I bring calm and reassurance to others

What would I love to have 24/7?
